The third part of the fourth chapter on the aggregates of the object-condition in the uddÄna verse: If the wholesome mind bound to the form realm has not yet been eliminated, is the object-condition also not yet eliminated?

Either the essence has not yet been eliminated but the object-condition has already been eliminated, or the essence has not yet been eliminated but the object-condition has already been eliminated and is not yet eliminated, or the essence has not yet been eliminated but it cannot be discriminated whether the object-condition of this mind has already been eliminated or not yet eliminated.

As for the essence not yet being eliminated but the object-condition not yet eliminated, it refers to the wholesome mind bound to the form realm of a person still bound by all bonds, which takes as its object that bound to the desire realm, that bound to the form realm, that bound to the formless realm, that bound to the desire realm and form realm, that bound to the desire realm and formless realm, that bound to the form realm and formless realm, and that bound to the desire realm, form realm, and formless realm.

Those who have already abandoned desire for the desire realm but have not yet abandoned desire for the form realm, and the cognition of the class of suffering has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds bound to the form realm take the form realm as object, take the formless realm as object, and take the form realm and formless realm as object.

Those who have not yet abandoned desire for the form realm, and the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds bound to the form realm take the seen accumulation, cessation, path, and the eliminated through cultivation as object.ğŸ”½The cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen but the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds bound to the form realm take the seen cessation, path, and the eliminated through cultivation as object.

The cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen but the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds bound to the form realm take the seen path and the eliminated through cultivation as object.

If one who has perfected insight, a disciple of the World-Honored One, has not yet abandoned desire for the form realm, all wholesome minds bound to the form realm take the eliminated through cultivation as object.
This is called the substance not yet eliminated and the object not yet eliminated.

As for the statement that its substance has not yet been eliminated but its object has been eliminated, this refers to those who have already become free from desire for the desire realm but have not yet become free from desire for the form realm, and the cognition of suffering has not yet arisen. All wholesome minds associated with the form realm take the desire realm as their object.

Those who have not yet become free from desire for the form realm, and the cognition of suffering has already arisen but the cognition of the cause of suffering has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take the objects to be eliminated by seeing suffering as their object.ğŸ”½Those who have already become free from desire for the form realm, and the cognition of the cause of suffering has already arisen but the cognition of the cessation of suffering has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take the objects to be eliminated by seeing suffering and the cause of suffering as their objects.

Those who have already become free from desire for the form realm, and the cognition of the cessation of suffering has already arisen but the cognition of the path has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take the objects to be eliminated by seeing suffering, the cause of suffering, and the cessation of suffering as their objects.

Those whose views are complete, the disciples of the World-Honored One, who have not yet become free from desire for the form realm, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take the objects to be eliminated by seeing as their objects.
This is called the substance not yet eliminated but the object already eliminated.

As for the essence that has not yet been eliminated, the object has already been eliminated and the object has not yet been eliminated. This refers to those who have already become free from desire in the desire realm but have not yet become free from desire in the form realm. All wholesome minds bound to the form realm take as their object those bound to the desire realm and those bound to the form realm, take as their object those bound to the desire realm and those bound to the formless realm, and take as their object those bound to the desire realm, those bound to the form realm, and those bound to the formless realm.

Those who have not yet become free from desire in the form realm, for whom the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds bound to the form realm take as their object the seen classes of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that eliminated by cultivation.ğŸ”½For those for whom the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen but the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds bound to the form realm take as their object the seen classes of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that eliminated by cultivation.

For those for whom the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen but the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds bound to the form realm take as their object the seen classes of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that eliminated by cultivation.

For those whose views are complete, disciples of the World-Honored One, who have not yet become free from desire in the form realm, all wholesome minds bound to the form realm take as their object that eliminated by seeing and cultivation.ğŸ”½Here is the corrected and aligned text:
This is called the essence not yet eliminated and the object already eliminated and not yet eliminated.

As for the essence not yet eliminated and unable to distinguish whether the object has already been eliminated or not yet eliminated, it refers to the wholesome minds bound to the form realm of all ordinary beings, taking as object what is not to be eliminated.ğŸ”½Having already abandoned craving for the desire realm but not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, before the knowledge of the class of suffering has arisen, the wholesome minds bound to the form realm, taking as object what is not to be eliminated.

Not yet having abandoned craving for the form realm, after the knowledge of the class of suffering has arisen but before the knowledge of the class of accumulation has arisen, the wholesome minds bound to the form realm, taking as object what is not to be eliminated.ğŸ”½After the knowledge of the class of accumulation has arisen but before the knowledge of the class of cessation has arisen, the wholesome minds bound to the form realm, taking as object what is not to be eliminated.

After the knowledge of the class of cessation has arisen but before the knowledge of the class of the path has arisen, the wholesome minds bound to the form realm, taking as object what is not to be eliminated.

If one who has perfected insight, a disciple of the World-Honored One, has not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, the wholesome minds bound to the form realm, taking as object what is not to be eliminated.
This is called the nature not yet eliminated, and it cannot be discriminated whether the object of this mind is already eliminated or not yet eliminated.
If the object is not yet eliminated, is its substance also not yet eliminated?

Either the object is not yet eliminated and its substance is not yet eliminated, or the object is not yet eliminated but its substance is already eliminated, or the object is not yet eliminated and the object is already eliminated but its substance is not yet eliminated, or the object is not yet eliminated and the object is already eliminated and its substance is already eliminated.

The object is not yet eliminated and its substance is not yet eliminated refers to the wholesome minds bound to the form realm of all ordinary beings, which take the desire realm as object, the form realm as object, the formless realm as object, the desire realm and form realm as object, the desire realm and formless realm as object, the form realm and formless realm as object, the desire realm, form realm, and formless realm as object.

Having already abandoned the craving of the desire realm, but not yet abandoned the craving of the form realm, and the cognition of the class of suffering has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take as objects those associated with the form realm, those associated with the formless realm, and those associated with both the form realm and the formless realm.

Not yet having abandoned the craving of the form realm, and the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen, but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take as objects those to be eliminated by seeing the accumulation, cessation, and path, as well as those to be eliminated by cultivation.ğŸ”½The cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen, but the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take as objects those to be eliminated by seeing the cessation, path, and cultivation.

The cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen, but the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take as objects those to be eliminated by seeing the path and cultivation.

If one has perfected insight, and the disciple of the World-Honored One has not yet abandoned the craving of the form realm, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm take as objects those to be eliminated by cultivation.
This is called the objects not yet eliminated and the substance not yet eliminated.

As for the object not yet eliminated while its substance has already been eliminated, it refers to the wholesome minds associated with the form realm of one who has already eliminated desire for the form realm but the knowledge of the class of suffering has not yet arisen, and whose objects are the form realm.

This is called the object not yet eliminated while its substance has already been eliminated.ğŸ”½As for the object not yet eliminated and the object already eliminated while its substance has not yet been eliminated, it refers to the wholesome minds associated with the form realm of one who has already eliminated desire for the desire realm but not yet eliminated desire for the form realm, whose objects are the desire realm, the form realm, the desire realm and the formless realm, the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.ğŸ”½As for one who has not yet eliminated desire for the form realm, after the knowledge of the class of suffering has arisen but before the knowledge of the class of accumulation has arisen, the wholesome minds associated with the form realm whose objects are the views of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

As for after the knowledge of the class of accumulation has arisen but before the knowledge of the class of cessation has arisen, the wholesome minds associated with the form realm whose objects are the views of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

When the knowledge of the elimination of the contaminants has already arisen and the knowledge of the path of the elimination of the contaminants has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm that are objects of the path of vision of suffering, origination, cessation, and the path, and that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.
If the perfect vision of the World Honored One's disciples has not yet been severed, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm that are objects of the path of vision and cultivation.
This is called the objects not yet severed and the objects already severed, but the substance not yet severed.

The objects not yet severed and the objects already severed, but the substance already severed, refers to those who have already severed attachment to the form realm but have not yet severed attachment to the formless realm, all wholesome minds associated with the form realm that take the desire realm and formless realm as objects, that take the form realm and formless realm as objects, and that take the desire realm, form realm, and formless realm as objects.
This is called the objects not yet severed and the objects already severed, but the substance already severed.
All wholesome minds associated with the form realm that are covered and unwholesome, if the substance has not yet been severed, are the objects not yet severed?

Either its substance has not yet been eliminated and its object has not yet been eliminated, or its substance has not yet been eliminated but its object has already been eliminated, or its substance has not yet been eliminated and its object has both already been eliminated and not yet been eliminated, or its substance has not yet been eliminated but one cannot discriminate whether its object has already been eliminated or not yet been eliminated.

As for its substance not yet having been eliminated and its object not yet having been eliminated, this refers to the covered and non-defined mind belonging to the realm of form of a person still bound by all bonds, taking as its object that belonging to the realm of form, that belonging to the formless realm, or that belonging to both the realm of form and the formless realm.ğŸ”½Having already become free from craving in the realm of desire but not yet free from craving in the realm of form, the knowledge of the class of suffering has not yet arisen, and the covered and non-defined mind belonging to the realm of form takes as its object that belonging to the realm of form, that belonging to the formless realm, or that belonging to both the realm of form and the formless realm.

Not yet free from craving in the realm of form, the knowledge of the class of suffering has already arisen but the knowledge of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, and the covered and non-defined mind belonging to the realm of form that is to be eliminated by seeing the truth of accumulation takes as its object that belonging to the realm of form, that belonging to the formless realm, or that belonging to both the realm of form and the formless realm.
The obscured-neutral mind eliminated by insight into the origin of suffering takes as its object that eliminated by insight into the origin of suffering.

The obscured-neutral mind eliminated by insight into cessation of suffering takes as its object that eliminated by insight into cessation of suffering. The obscured-neutral mind eliminated by insight into the path of cessation of suffering takes as its object that eliminated by insight into the path of cessation of suffering.
The obscured-neutral mind eliminated by cultivation takes as its object that eliminated by cultivation.

When the knowledge of the origin of suffering has arisen and the knowledge of the cessation of suffering has not yet arisen, the obscured-neutral mind of the realm of form eliminated by insight into cessation of suffering takes as its object that eliminated by insight into cessation of suffering.
The obscured-neutral mind eliminated by insight into the path of cessation of suffering takes as its object that eliminated by insight into the path of cessation of suffering.
The obscured-neutral mind eliminated by cultivation takes as its object that eliminated by cultivation.

When the knowledge of the cessation of suffering has arisen and the knowledge of the path of cessation of suffering has not yet arisen, the obscured-neutral mind of the realm of form eliminated by insight into the path of cessation of suffering takes as its object that eliminated by insight into the path of cessation of suffering.
The obscured-neutral mind eliminated by cultivation takes as its object that eliminated by cultivation.

If one sees a perfected disciple who has not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, all form-realm-bound obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by cultivation take the eliminated by cultivation as their object.
This is called the substance has not yet been eliminated, but the object has been eliminated.

As for the substance has not yet been eliminated, but the object has been eliminated, it refers to one who has not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, for whom the cognition of the class of suffering has arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all form-realm-bound obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by seeing the accumulation take the eliminated by seeing the suffering as their object.
This is called the substance has not yet been eliminated, but the object has been eliminated.

As for the substance has not yet been eliminated, but the object has been eliminated and the object has not yet been eliminated, it refers to one who has not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, for whom the cognition of the class of suffering has arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all form-realm-bound obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by seeing the accumulation take the eliminated by seeing the suffering, accumulation, cessation, and path, as well as the eliminated by cultivation, as their object.
This is called the substance has not yet been eliminated, but the object has been eliminated and the object has not yet been eliminated.

As for the mind whose object has not yet been eliminated and cannot be distinguished as having been eliminated or not, it refers to the defiled and indeterminate minds of the form realm of all ordinary beings, which take as their objects what has not yet been eliminated.ğŸ”½Those who have already abandoned craving for the desire realm but have not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, before the arising of the cognition of the class of suffering, the defiled and indeterminate minds of the form realm take as their objects what has not yet been eliminated.

Those who have not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, after the arising of the cognition of the class of suffering but before the arising of the cognition of the class of accumulation, the defiled and indeterminate minds of the form realm take as their objects what has not yet been eliminated.ğŸ”½After the arising of the cognition of the class of accumulation but before the arising of the cognition of the class of cessation, the defiled and indeterminate minds of the form realm that are eliminated by the path of insight into cessation take as their objects what has not yet been eliminated.

After the arising of the cognition of the class of cessation but before the arising of the cognition of the class of the path, the defiled and indeterminate minds of the form realm that are eliminated by the path of insight into the path take as their objects what has not yet been eliminated.
This is called the mind whose object has not yet been eliminated and cannot be distinguished as having been eliminated or not.
If the object is not yet eliminated, is its substance also not yet eliminated?

Either the object is not yet eliminated and its substance is not yet eliminated, or the object is not yet eliminated but its substance is already eliminated, or the object is not yet eliminated and the object is already eliminated but its substance is not yet eliminated, or the object is not yet eliminated and the object is already eliminated and its substance is already eliminated.

As for the object not yet eliminated and its substance not yet eliminated, it refers to the bound-to-all ordinary beings, and the obscured-neutral minds bound to the form realm, which take as objects those bound to the form realm, those bound to the formless realm, and those bound to both the form realm and formless realm.

Having already abandoned craving for the desire realm but not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, before the knowledge of the class of suffering has arisen, the obscured-neutral minds bound to the form realm take as objects those bound to the form realm, those bound to the formless realm, and those bound to both the form realm and formless realm.

When the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen and the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, the defiled and indeterminate mind of the form realm bound to the seen that is to be eliminated by the path of seeing accumulation, takes as its object the seen cessation and path of the class of accumulation, and that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

The defiled and indeterminate mind that is to be eliminated by the path of seeing accumulation, takes as its object that which is to be eliminated by the path of seeing accumulation.ğŸ”½The defiled and indeterminate mind that is to be eliminated by the path of seeing cessation, takes as its object that which is to be eliminated by the path of seeing cessation.
The defiled and indeterminate mind that is to be eliminated by the path of seeing the path, takes as its object that which is to be eliminated by the path of seeing the path.
The defiled and indeterminate mind that is to be eliminated by cultivation, takes as its object that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

When the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, the defiled and indeterminate mind of the form realm bound to the seen that is to be eliminated by the path of seeing cessation, takes as its object that which is to be eliminated by the path of seeing cessation.
The defiled and indeterminate mind that is to be eliminated by the path of seeing the path, takes as its object that which is to be eliminated by the path of seeing the path.
The defiled and indeterminate mind that is to be eliminated by cultivation, takes as its object that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

When the knowledge of the class of elimination has already arisen and the knowledge of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing the path take as their object those to be eliminated by seeing the path.
The obscured indeterminate minds to be eliminated by cultivation take as their object those to be eliminated by cultivation.

If one who has perfected the view, a disciple of the World-Honored One, has not yet eliminated craving for the form realm, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by cultivation take as their object those to be eliminated by cultivation.

This is called that which has not yet eliminated its object and whose substance has not yet been eliminated.ğŸ”½As for that which has not yet eliminated its object but whose substance has already been eliminated, it refers to one who has not yet eliminated craving for the form realm, for whom the knowledge of the class of suffering has already arisen but the knowledge of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing the truth of suffering take as their object those to be eliminated by seeing the truths of accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as those to be eliminated by cultivation.

For whom the knowledge of the class of accumulation has already arisen but the knowledge of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing the truths of suffering and accumulation take as their object those to be eliminated by seeing the truths of cessation, the path, and those to be eliminated by cultivation.

When the knowledge of the elimination of the class [of afflictions] has already arisen and the knowledge of the path of the class [of afflictions] has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing suffering and the origin, take as their objects the path of seeing and that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

If one has perfected the view and is a disciple of the World-Honored One, but has not yet eliminated craving for the form realm, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing take as their objects that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

Having already eliminated craving for the form realm but not yet eliminated craving for the formless realm, when the knowledge of the class of suffering has already arisen but the knowledge of the class of origination has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as their objects that which is associated with the formless realm.
This is called the object is not yet eliminated but its substance has already been eliminated.

As for the object is not yet eliminated and the object has already been eliminated but its substance has not yet been eliminated, it refers to one who has not yet eliminated craving for the form realm, when the knowledge of the class of suffering has already arisen but the knowledge of the class of origination has not yet arisen, all obscured indeterminate minds associated with the form realm that are to be eliminated by seeing the origin take as their objects the cessation of seeing suffering and the origin, the path of seeing, and that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.
This is called the object is not yet eliminated and the object has already been eliminated but its substance has not yet been eliminated.

As for the object not yet eliminated and the object already eliminated, its substance has already been eliminated. This refers to those who have not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, for whom the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen but the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen. All form-realm-bound obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by seeing the truth of suffering have as their objects the truths of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that eliminated by cultivation.

For those for whom the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen but the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all form-realm-bound obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by seeing the truths of suffering and accumulation have as their objects the truths of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that eliminated by cultivation.

For those for whom the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen but the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all form-realm-bound obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by seeing the truths of suffering and accumulation have as their objects the truths of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that eliminated by cultivation.

For those whose views are complete, disciples of the World-Honored One who have not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, all form-realm-bound obscured indeterminate minds eliminated by seeing the truths have as their objects that eliminated by seeing and cultivation.

Those who have already abandoned craving for the form realm but have not yet abandoned craving for the formless realm, all form-realm-connected obscured indeterminate minds take form-realm-connected and formless-realm-connected [dharmas] as objects.
This is called the objects not yet eliminated and the objects already eliminated, and their substance already eliminated.
All form-realm-connected uncovered indeterminate minds, if their substance is not yet eliminated, do their objects not yet eliminated?

Either their substance is not yet eliminated and their objects not yet eliminated, or their substance is not yet eliminated and their objects already eliminated, or their substance is not yet eliminated and their objects both already eliminated and not yet eliminated.

As for their substance not yet eliminated and their objects not yet eliminated, it refers to all fettered ordinary beings, all form-realm-connected uncovered indeterminate minds taking desire-realm-connected and form-realm-connected [dharmas] as objects.

Those who have already abandoned craving for the desire realm but have not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, for whom the cognition of the class of suffering has not yet arisen, all form-realm-connected uncovered indeterminate minds take form-realm-connected [dharmas] as objects.

When one has not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, when the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen and the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as objects the views of the class of accumulation, cessation, and path, as well as that which is eliminated by cultivation.

When the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as objects the views of the class of cessation, path, and that which is eliminated by cultivation.

When the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of path has not yet arisen, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as objects the views of the class of path and that which is eliminated by cultivation.

If one has perfected the views and is a disciple of the World-Honored One who has not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as objects that which is eliminated by cultivation.
This is called the substance not yet eliminated and the object not yet eliminated.

As for the substance not yet eliminated and the object already eliminated, it refers to one who has already abandoned craving for the desire realm but has not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, when the cognition of the class of suffering has not yet arisen, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as objects that which is associated with the desire realm.

When one has not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, when the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen and the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as their object what is to be eliminated by seeing suffering.ğŸ”½When the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as their object what is to be eliminated by seeing suffering and accumulation.

When the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as their object what is to be eliminated by seeing suffering, accumulation, and cessation.

If one has perfected insight and is a disciple of the World-Honored One who has not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as their object what is to be eliminated by seeing.
This is called the substance has not yet been eliminated but the object has been eliminated.

As for the substance that has not yet been eliminated and the object that has been eliminated and the object that has not yet been eliminated, it refers to one who has not yet abandoned craving for the form realm, when the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen and the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds associated with the form realm take as their object what is to be eliminated by seeing suffering, accumulation, cessation, the path, and cultivation.

When the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds belonging to the form realm take as their object the seeing of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that which is eliminated through cultivation.

When the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds belonging to the form realm take as their object the seeing of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path, as well as that which is eliminated through cultivation.

If one who has perfected the view, a disciple of the World-Honored One, has not yet eliminated craving for the form realm, all the unobstructed indeterminate minds belonging to the form realm take as their object the seeing and cultivation that is eliminated.
This is called the substance not yet eliminated and the object already eliminated, as well as the object not yet eliminated.
If the object is not yet eliminated, is its substance also not yet eliminated?
He said:
It is so.
All wholesome minds belonging to the formless realm, if their substance is not yet eliminated, are their objects also not yet eliminated?

Either its substance has not yet been eliminated and its object has not yet been eliminated, or its substance has not yet been eliminated but its object has already been eliminated, or its substance has not yet been eliminated and its object has both already been eliminated and not yet been eliminated, or its substance has not yet been eliminated but its object cannot be discriminated as either already eliminated or not yet eliminated.

As for its substance not yet having been eliminated and its object not yet having been eliminated, this refers to the wholesome thought associated with the realm of formlessness belonging to those still bound by the bonds, which takes as its object that associated with the realm of form and that associated with the realm of formlessness.ğŸ”½Having already become free from craving in the realm of desire but not yet free from that in the realm of form, when the knowledge of the class of suffering has not yet arisen, the wholesome thought associated with the realm of formlessness takes as its object that associated with the realm of form and that associated with the realm of formlessness.

Having already become free from craving in the realm of form, when the knowledge of the class of suffering has not yet arisen, the wholesome thought associated with the realm of formlessness takes as its object that associated with the realm of formlessness.

When the knowledge of the class of suffering has already arisen but the knowledge of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, the wholesome thought associated with the realm of formlessness takes as its object that which is to be eliminated by the vision of the class of accumulation, that which is to be eliminated by the vision of the class of cessation, that which is to be eliminated by the vision of the class of the path, and that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

When the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm take as their object what is to be eliminated by seeing cessation and the path, as well as what is to be eliminated by cultivation.ğŸ”½When the cognition of the class of cessation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of the path has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm take as their object what is to be eliminated by seeing the path and what is to be eliminated by cultivation.

If one who has perfected insight, a disciple of the World-Honored One, has not yet eliminated craving for the formless realm, all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm take as their object what is to be eliminated by cultivation.
This is called the substance has not yet been eliminated and the object has not yet been eliminated.

As for the substance has not yet been eliminated but the object has already been eliminated, it refers to one who has already eliminated craving for the form realm, but the cognition of the class of suffering has not yet arisen, and all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm take as their object what is associated with the form realm.ğŸ”½When the cognition of the class of suffering has already arisen and the cognition of the class of accumulation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm take as their object what is to be eliminated by seeing the suffering of the formless realm.

When the cognition of the class of accumulation has already arisen and the cognition of the class of cessation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm take as their object what is to be eliminated by seeing the suffering and accumulation of the formless realm.

When the knowledge of the elimination of the contaminants has already arisen but the knowledge of the path has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm that take as their object the abandonment of that which is to be eliminated by seeing the truths of suffering, origination, and cessation.

If one who has perfected the view, a disciple of the World-Honored One, has not yet eliminated craving for the formless realm, all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm that take as their object that which is to be eliminated by seeing [the truths].

This is called the substance has not yet been eliminated but the object has been eliminated.ğŸ”½As for the substance has not yet been eliminated but the object has been eliminated and the object has not yet been eliminated, it refers to when the knowledge of the aspects of the truth of suffering has already arisen but the knowledge of the aspects of the truth of origination has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm that take as their object the abandonment of the truths of suffering, origination, cessation, and the path, as well as that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.ğŸ”½When the knowledge of the aspects of the truth of origination has already arisen but the knowledge of the aspects of the truth of cessation has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm that take as their object the abandonment of the truths of suffering, origination, cessation, and the path, as well as that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.

When the knowledge of the aspects of the truth of cessation has already arisen but the knowledge of the aspects of the path has not yet arisen, all wholesome minds associated with the formless realm that take as their object the abandonment of the truths of suffering, origination, cessation, and the path, as well as that which is to be eliminated by cultivation.
If one sees a perfected disciple who has not yet abandoned the craving of the formless realm, all wholesome minds bound to the formless realm take the seen and cultivated as objects.
